title: Burn the Book logo font ID
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071058im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_btb_6191.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071058im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Red-White-Letterpress-Edge-Painting-Business-Cards1_3656.jpg)

Hi there,

I need your help finding what's the font (or similar) they have used to create their brand ID.

Thanks for your help.

Font: 

 Tangier 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071058/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

author: Actarus

comments.content: They may have started with [Tangier](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071058/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/tangier) mainly because of / [k](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071058/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/tangier/bold/glyphs.html#glyphs/467751/181).
